code: import{MEDIA_SET_ACTIONS,MEDIA_CLEAR_ACTIONS}from"./media.types";export var setComments=function setComments(comments){return{type:MEDIA_SET_ACTIONS.COMMENTS,payload:comments};};export var clearComments=function clearComments(){return{type:MEDIA_CLEAR_ACTIONS.COMMENTS,payload:[]};};export var setMediaId=function setMediaId(id){return{type:MEDIA_SET_ACTIONS.MEDIA_ID,payload:id};};export var clearMediaId=function clearMediaId(){return{type:MEDIA_CLEAR_ACTIONS.MEDIA_ID,payload:""};};export var setCreatorInfo=function setCreatorInfo(info){return{type:MEDIA_SET_ACTIONS.CREATOR_INFO,payload:info};};export var clearCreatorInfo=function clearCreatorInfo(){return{type:MEDIA_CLEAR_ACTIONS.CREATOR_INFO,payload:[]};};export var setVideoInfo=function setVideoInfo(info){return{type:MEDIA_SET_ACTIONS.VIDEO_INFO,payload:info};};export var clearVideoInfo=function clearVideoInfo(){return{type:MEDIA_CLEAR_ACTIONS.VIDEO_INFO,payload:[]};};
